Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Westbound Reroute near Diversey/Wayne
ShortDescription: Westbound 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Racine, Fullerton, Southport and Diversey due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Racine, Fullerton, Southport and Diversey due to street blockage near Diversey/Wayne.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Southbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Kostner, Cermak and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Cicero/16th.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with delays at Midway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with delays at Midway.
